briefTitle: Study of the Effect of Vitamin D as an Add-on Therapy to Corticosteroids in Asthma
officialTitle: Vitamin D Add-on Therapy Enhances Corticosteroid Responsiveness in Asthma
summary: The purpose of the study is to find out if taking vitamin D in addition to an asthma controller medication helps to prevent worsening of asthma symptoms and asthma attacks.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Twenty-eight week intervention period from randomization until end of trial.

commonTop: Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue
